p: N,N-Bis(di-p-tolyl)phosphinoylmethyl)ethanolamin e ( 12b): Yield: 93% (0.51 g), white crystal *; 31P NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 29.4; 13C NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 21.6 (C 4CH 3), 55.5 (dd, 1 J CP = 81.2, 3 J CP = 5.5, CH 2P), 59.9 (HOCH 2), 60.3 (t, 3 J CP = 4.9, CH 2N), 128.8 (d, 1 J CP = 98.5, C 1), 129.3 (m, C 3), 131.1 (m, C 2), 142.3 (brs, C 4); 1H NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 2.36 (s, 12H, C 4CH 3), 3.02 (t, J HH = 5.0, 2H, CH 2N), 3.54 (t, J HH = 4.7, 2H, HOC H 2), 3.73 (d, J HP = 3.7, 4H, CH 2P), 7.07–7.32 (m, 8H, C 2H) 7.46–7.70 (m, 8H, C 3H); [M + H] + found = 546.2308, C 32H 38NO 3P 2 requires 546.2326. *No sharp melting point was observed.
